title: Kamala Harris, Barack Obama, National Radio Day, Megan Thee Stallion and more.
itunes:title: Kamala Harris, Barack Obama, National Radio Day, Megan Thee Stallion and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve has a throwback that takes you way back and will give you a flashback in honor of National Radio Day! The Chief Love Officer has his plate full with a relationship involving physical abuse. Trump is boycotting Goodyear tires for their stance against MAGA. Barack Obama speaks the truth about 45. Sheryl Underwood has a message just for the young folks. We here at The Steve Harvey Morning Show are grateful to all of The Steve Harvey Nation for their support over the years. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve reflects on the words of Barack Obama at the DNC. Big Dog also defends Kamala Harris against the negativity. VOTE!!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
